name: The 3rd Int'l Conference on Advanced Functional Materials
content: The 3rd Int'l Conference on Advanced Functional Materials (CAFM 2022) Conference Date: August 13-15, 2022 Conference Venue: Xiamen, China Website: https://www.wsaugust.org/conference/CAFM2022/ Online Registration System: https://www.wsaugust.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1504 Email: wsaugust@126.com The 3rd Int'l Conference on Advanced Functional Materials (CAFM 2022) will be held from August 13-15, 2022 in Xiamen, China. This Conference will cover issues on Applications of functional materials, Functional materials, Luminescent and Radiation Sensing Materials, Physics of functional materials, Smart materials, Smart Structures and Materials. If you wish to serve the conference as an invited speaker, please send email to us with your CV. We'll contact with you asap.
